description_for_human: Open financial intelligence platform â€” 200+ modules covering equities, crypto, macro, fixed income, commodities, and alternative data. Free, MCP-ready, self-evolving.
description_for_model: QuantClaw Data provides 200+ financial data modules accessible via REST API. Covers real-time prices, options, technicals, SEC filings, congressional trades, sentiment analysis, macro indicators, crypto on-chain data, Monte Carlo simulations, and more. All endpoints are at https://data.quantclaw.org/api/v1/{tool}?ticker=SYMBOL. No API key required. Also available as MCP tools for AI agent integration.
